articles.title: Female journalist wins pay-discrimination case against BBC
articles.description: A BBC journalist who was paid a fraction of the fee received by a male colleague doing a similar job has won a sex-discrimination lawsuit against the British broadcaster
articles.content:
Ahmed was paid 465 pounds ($608) per episode of Newswatch on the BBC News Channel while Vine received 3,000 pounds ($3,920) for each episode of Points of View on the more widely watched channel BBC One.
